      获取状态栏高度 Get statusbar height, this method cannot be used in onCreate(),onStart(),onResume(), unless it is called in the post(Runnable).

      获取状态栏高度 Get statusbar height

      获取标题栏高度 Get titlebar height, this method cannot be used in onCreate(),onStart(),onResume(), unless it is called in the post(Runnable).

      是否横屏

      是否竖屏

      Convert px to sp
